__TOC__
==Description==
[[Hit Points]] or "Health" are is the amount of damage a player can sustain, it is one of the three stats along with [[Mana]] and [[Stamina]]. [[Hit Points]] is determined by the level of [[Strength]] which translate into your characters total [[Hit Points]]. [[Hit Points]] are depleted when your character takes damage.

==Raising Hit points==
A character's [[Hit Points]] can be increased by increasing [[Strength]]. In addition to increasing the amount of strength a character has, The potion Strength, Magery spell Strength, and certain magical foods such as rare fish, temporarily increase hit points in addition to the stat strength.

==Regneration==
All creatures, NPCs and player characters have a natural rate of hit point regeneration, whereby lost hit points are slowly regained or can be healed with spells or [[Bandages]].
